name: Blossom & Bliss
description: Blossom & Bliss is a web application designed for a beauty and wellness parlour. It allows customers to browse services, book appointments, and make online payments.

name: Street-11
description: Street11 is a modern web application designed for seamless online ordering and menu browsing.Users can explore various food categories, customize their orders, and place them online

name: Dear Watch
description: Dear Watch is a watch selling website where users can browse different watch collections, view details, and make purchases.

name: Core Health Wellness Center
description: A task management tool that allows users to create, update, and delete tasks with different statuses.
